content: Would love to put FHIR-34475 on the agenda for Jan 10 (@Yunwei Wang do we have a good way to schedule something this early, or should I ask again closer to that date?)
We don't have a good way to do that. You can remind me next week since there is not meeting between 12/20 and 1/10
OK, New Year unlocked! For next Mon Jan 10, can we add FHIR-34475 to the agenda?
